sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>When a new e-mail is coming to the system from white listed user / vendor, open an incident with Service Category: ,Category: ,sub-Category. based on the user record.</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 00:00:00</actual_hours> <approval>requested</approval> <assigned_to display_value="Stephen Walker">74168f824fa063007e72aa95d310c727</assigned_to> <assignment_group display_value="INTU" name="INTU">c0f22cde4f6463007e72aa95d310c7f3</assignment_group> <category display_value="Inbound action">5ba54b474f6ce3007e72aa95d310c7a1</category> <company display_value="INTU">98712c9e4f6463007e72aa95d310c75c</company> <description>All emails from whitelisted users / vendors will be checked against the user record to see if theres a mapping for Service Category / Category, and when the incident is created, the icnident will be assigned to the relevent service Category & category & sub-Category</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 02:00:00</estimated_hours> <estimated_hours_sp>1970-01-01 02:00:00</estimated_hours_sp> <notes/> <number>TAS0001153</number> <package display_value="PACK0001020">88d712514f8523007e72aa95d310c748</package> <short_description>Inbound action - Auto assign whitelisted callers to Service category & Category</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>New</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-08 19:59:56</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3d099e514f8523007e72aa95d310c74a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-11 10:15:24</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
